statements: SELECT item_name, current_quantity FROM inventory_levels
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity > min_threshold
SELECT item_name, max_threshold FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT item_name, current_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE item_id = 3
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity <= max_threshold AND min_threshold < 5
SELECT item_name, current_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity > min_threshold ORDER BY current_quantity DESC
SELECT item_name, max_threshold FROM inventory_levels WHERE max_threshold < current_quantity ORDER BY max_threshold ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity < min_threshold OR current_quantity > max_threshold ORDER BY item_name
SELECT item_name, max_threshold, min_threshold FROM inventory_levels WHERE item_name LIKE '%shirt%' ORDER BY item_id
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM inventory_levels WHERE min_threshold <= current_quantity AND max_threshold >= current_quantity ORDER BY item_name
SELECT * FROM food_items WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM food_items ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, expiring_date FROM food_items WHERE expiring_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT item_id, COUNT(alert_type) AS total_alerts FROM alerts GROUP BY item_id HAVING total_alerts > 5;
SELECT * FROM food_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, expiring_date FROM food_items WHERE expiring_date >= CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT id, alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM food_items WHERE item_name LIKE 'Apple%';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM food_items ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE item_id = 3;
SELECT item_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT users.username, inventory.item_name, inventory.quantity FROM users INNER JOIN inventory ON users.user_id = inventory.item_id;
SELECT item_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM inventory ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT users.username, inventory.item_name, alerts.alert_message FROM users INNER JOIN inventory ON users.user_id = inventory.item_id INNER JOIN alerts ON inventory.item_id = alerts.item_id;
SELECT * FROM FoodItem;
SELECT name, quantity FROM FoodItem ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT id, location, temperature FROM Fridge WHERE temperature < 4;
SELECT * FROM InventoryAlert WHERE alert_type = 'Low Quantity';
SELECT recipient_name, email FROM AlertRecipient ORDER BY recipient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM FoodItem WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, quantity FROM FoodItem WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Fridge WHERE temperature BETWEEN 2.0 AND 5.0 ORDER BY location;
SELECT location, temperature FROM Fridge WHERE temperature > 4.0 AND location LIKE 'K%' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT recipient_name, email FROM AlertRecipient WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY recipient_name
SELECT * FROM FoodItems;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM FoodItems WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT fridge_id, item_id, quantity FROM FridgeInventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_date FROM FridgeHistory WHERE event_type = 'Restock' ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM FoodItems WHERE location IN ('Kitchen', 'Pantry') ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM FoodItems WHERE location = 'pantry';
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM FoodItems ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM FoodItems WHERE quantity > 10 AND location = 'fridge' ORDER BY item_name;
SELECT * FROM FridgeInventory JOIN FoodItems ON FridgeInventory.item_id = FoodItems.item_id WHERE quantity < alert_threshold;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_date, event_details FROM FridgeHistory WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
